## Math2D.Box class

Alternative 2D box object with less memory impact (four numbers instead of two min/max objects with two numbers each). Should be faster.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
class Box 
```

## Constructors

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(x, y, w, h)](./harp-utils.math2d.box._constructor_.md) |  | Alternative 2D box object with less memory impact (four numbers instead of two min/max objects with two numbers each). Should be faster. |

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [contains(x, y)](./harp-utils.math2d.box.contains.md) |  | Test box for inclusion of point. |
